alert.note: Alert for Lower Garfield and Asotin Counties (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 31 at 5:01AM PST until January 31 at 1:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Clarkston Heights, Clarkston, Alpowa Summit, and Pomeroy. * WHEN...Until 1 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong cross winds are expected to impact Highway 12 between Dayton and Clarkston.
info.instruction: Winds this strong will make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution. Secure outdoor objects.
